content: in this legal case the pärnu county court made a final decision after 7 months the details of the case were not mentioned the courts decision referred to as court dec was summarized in a legal text the case was heard at the sion court in pärnu county with a judge presiding over it the civil case number is 2224259 on october 13 2022 a decree was made in the case the civil suit involved joint assets worth 3500 euros the procedure being taken is the termination of the procedure through the approval of a compromise the parties involved are the plaintiff referred to as x and the defendant whose identity is not disclosed both parties have confirmed and digitally signed the compromise agreement which includes the division of joint assets the plaintiff will retain certain bank accounts and a company while the defendant will retain a vehicle and a marine vessel the plaintiff is required to pay compensation of 40000 euros to the defendant for their share of the joint assets with specific installment deadlines the compromise agreement settles any future claims or pretensions regarding the assets the expenses related to the agreement and the division of assets will be borne by the party who incurred them the civil case proceedings are terminated and the procedural costs will be distributed between the parties a court hearing scheduled for december 13 2022 is canceled the parties have agreed to exclude the right to file an appeal in september 2022 the court granted xs request for a divorce and then proceeded with the civil case to determine the division of shared assets the compromise agreement was digitally signed by both parties and submitted to the court the court confirms the compromise and terminates the proceedings the court notes that the costs of the proceedings will be distributed among the parties involved the parties have the right to file an appeal unless they have agreed otherwise
